Is everyone entitled to free secondary care?

John 2 hours ago

Ask your own question

Post your question to the community of interest

Ask a question

3 Answers

The guidance for secondary care is very complex. Importantly, A&E and infectious diseases remain free at point of care, but other services are charged depending on immigration status. See the section on entitlements to healthcare for more information.

9 hours ago

migrants are not entitled to secondary care

9 hours ago

everyone is entitled to free secondary care

9 hours ago
